sections.heading: Severability6-267.SeverabilityIf a provision of this article or its application to a person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity does not affect another provision or application that can be given effect without the invalid provision
sections.text: Severability6-267.SeverabilityIf a provision of this article or its application to a person or circumstance is held invalid, the invalidity does not affect another provision or application that can be given effect without the invalid provision.
